title: Radio Pakistan vital source of news, entertainment for masses: Pullain Baloch
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 2 (APP):Chairman National Assembly Standing Committee on Information and Broadcasting Pullain Baloch on Tuesday said that Radio Pakistan was an important source of news and entertainment for people.
During a visit to Radio Pakistan Quetta, he said all available resources will be utilized for the betterment of the state broadcaster, said a press release issued here.
Pullain Baloch promisedÂ  that problems being faced by Radio Pakistan and its employees will be addressed on priority basis.
